body.raw: Lead adviser on digital cross-platform integration products for LEGO, including the mass customization platform, the massively multiplayer game, and the creative social network system. Experience design for innovative hybrid social media/gaming projects and platforms. Key role in creating LEGO’s digital strategy road map.
